about_the_game:
In Song of the Tides, venture out into the Shifting Isles, challenge mighty foes and gain the incredible power and knowledge hidden beyond the edge of the world.

OUTPLAY AND OUTSMART


Master the arts of conventional, aerial and magic based combat to humiliate once mighty foes. Use the full range of weapons and abilities at your disposal and be rewarded with incredible power in return.

1000 WAYS TO DIE, 1000 WAYS TO WIN


Venturing into the Tides, you never know what's hidden behind the next wave. With more islands then stars in the sky and thousands of possible class combinations it is up to you to discover the insane synergies no one thought possible.

UNVEIL THE ULTIMATE LIE


You are forsaken by the world but not alone. With your companions you will venture out into the ever changing archipelago to uncover the secrets hidden in this strange land.
